page.title: 14Bideford:S+SE.Oldiscleave Fm
page.content: Some mornings I help my mum with the cr -eam:the milk is left so the cream sett les,put on the Aga stove,left to cool, and the cream taken off.The milk is th- en fed to the animals,that is the 9 ca- ts,2 sheepdogs Roy and Danny,and span- iel Tessa.I then go to school which is a journey of about 2 mls..From my house to the road we have to travel through a lane which is very narrow and winding. At 12 o'clock every day the chickens are let out and the eggs picked up,wash ed and later sold.The chickens are shut up again between 5 and 9 o'clock at ni- ght depending on the time of year.The geese are also let out and then shut in and at Christmas killed and sold.My dad feeds the animals every morning then either hay-makes,does the corn,sprays, fertilizes,ploughs or silages.Silaging is when the grass is cut,packed tightly into a pit then covered with _____Cont.
